alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 12:17AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Guadalupe, northwestern Wilson, central Bexar and southeastern Comal Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1217 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lackland AFB, or near San Antonio, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, Schertz, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Stinson Municipal Airport, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB, Leon Valley, Helotes, Kirby, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Shavano Park, and Hollywood Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Texas.
